author: Filmento
description:
Click this link https://boot.dev/?promo=FILMENTO and use my code FILMENTO to get 25% off your first payment for boot.dev.

After Earth is a nepotism movie starring Will Smith and his son Jaden. But the real main character of the story is writer-director M Night Shyamalan, whose career was destroyed by this movie. The only way he could work anymore was by self-financing his own indie horror movies. So what exactly was it about After Earth that led to that point? Hint: it's very similar to Gods of Egypt and I, Frankenstein which we've covered before.

title: After Earth – When a Movie Destroyed a Filmmaker's Career | Anatomy of a Failure
